title: Cypherpunks
author: Julian Assange
overview: The book asserts that states fundamentally operate through the threat or application of violence. Property rights, taxation, censorship, and intellectual property laws are all enforced by state-sanctioned coercion.

themes.title: The State as a System of Coercive Violence
description: The book argues that the foundation of state power lies in its ability to enforce laws and regulations through coercion.

themes.title: Encryption as Non-Violent Resistance
description: Cryptography is framed as a revolutionary tool to neutralize state violence.
